title: Bonus 3: James the Just in the Late Second Temple period (Part 1)
itunes:title: James the Just in the Late Second Temple Period (Part 1)
description: Steve Guerra and I discuss James the Just, how he got to be called James rather than Jacob in English, why he was James the Awesome, his relationship to Jesus, how the Catholics and Orthodox think about him, and Jesus' family life and economic situation. You can visit Steve at the History of the Papacy podcast
content:encoded: Steve Guerra and I discuss James the Just, how he got to be called James rather than Jacob in English, why he was James the Awesome, his relationship to Jesus, how the Catholics and Orthodox think about him, and Jesus' family life and economic situation. You can visit Steve at the History of the Papacy podcast
itunes:subtitle: A conversation about James the Just, with Steve Guerra.
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
